The main hero, famous for his bravery, jumping skills, and rescuing Princess Peach. Marios brother, slightly taller and known for his shy yet brave character. The princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, frequently kidnapped by Bowser but always rescued by Mario. The King of the Koopas, the main villain who tries to take over the Mushroom Kingdom and kidnaps Peach. A loyal dinosaur who helps Mario and Luigi on their adventures, known for his ability to swallow enemies. A resident and guardian of the Mushroom Kingdom who assists Mario and Peach. A large and strong gorilla who was initially Marios rival but is now an occasional ally. Marios rival, selfish and ambitious, always looking for ways to get rich. Warios brother, known for his envy of Luigi and his mischief. The princess of Sarasaland and Peachs friend, brave and outgoing. A common enemy in the Mushroom Kingdom, with a shell that can be used as a weapon when hit. A classic Mario enemy, small but persistent in blocking his path. Bowsers son, with a strong desire to impress his father and follow in his footsteps. Guardian of the cosmos and Marios friend, she accompanies the Lumas on their space adventures. A Koopa who flies on a cloud and throws spines at Mario, sometimes helping as a cameraman in Mario Kart.
